alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 07 at 2:27AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN PEMISCOT AND SOUTHEASTERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 227 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hayti Heights, or near Hayti, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hayti, Steele, Hornersville, Hayti Heights, Deering, Pascola, Rives, Bowie Corner, Hornersville Junction, Braggadocio, Samford, New Survey, Channel, Denton, Gobler, Covington, Tinkerville, Shade, Deer Land and Sunrise. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
